content: We used to have synchronous meetings, but we stopped those once it became clear that everyone present was too swamped to make forward progress
but I’d like to figure out how best to get the ball rolling again
I myself am going to take a page from Niko’s playbook, and try to allocate dedicate times where I will be openly working on certain subjects.
for the topic of incr-comp, I’d like to pick a day+time compatible with most people who think they can coordinate likewise.
